snippet.title: Infliction Extended Cut – Gameplay | PS4
snippet.description:
Infliction: Extended Cut is an interactive nightmare, a journey into the dark secrets of a fractured home. Wander through the heartbreaking remnants of a once-happy family, piecing together clues and trying to atone for past sins. All the while, a malevolent force stalks your footsteps, seeking violent retribution. Can you survive long enough to piece together the past, or will you become the victim? Available February 25th, 2020
 ---
